text:
People publishing code with semantic versioning, but then refusing to follow it, causing your assumptions to break because you're not using the most up to date code.
Bonus: if you bring it up they consider nuking the public facing repo because it causes them too much hassle.

text: The work this person has done is absolutely invaluable but if they break part of their workflow I have to start from scratch and...
